title: 'The Game We Are Making Now Is a Nintendo Game' — Metroid Prime Producer Kensuke Tanabe Reveals Creative Tensions With Retro in New Book - IGN
description: Nintendo and Retro Studios brought Metroid into stunning 3D, reforming the series in a first-person shooter style through a sometimes challenging but ultimately fruitful relationship between Japanese and Western teams with their own unique backgrounds and per…
